member_organisations: Settler Cleantech Oy has no member organisations.
fields_of_interest: Energy, Environment, Climate Action, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: We are seeking EFSI or direct EIB funding for financing cleantech investments in the European single-market.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: Settler Cleantech Oy is not a member of any of the above-mentioned bodies.
goals__remit: To facilitate cleantech investments in the European single-market through innovative marketing and financing solutions.
relevant_communication: None at the moment. In the future the goal is to obtain financing for cleantech investments in the European single-market, succeeding in which would give cause for PR communication about the initiative.
